title: FS: 2 Tough SLer's in high grade, Carlos Smith! Cad Coles! **SOLD**

posts.post_title: FS: 2 Tough SLer's in high grade, Carlos Smith! Cad Coles! **SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Two of the toughest SLer's to find in high grade. Both of these cards would be 8's or 8.5's if not for top to bottom centering, razor sharp corners and spotless backs... The last PSA 7 Coles sold for $2938!!  thanks...

SGC 84 Coles.....$1375
SGC 86 C. Smith...$1475

$2200 for the pair, thanks for looking....  **SOLD**
